title: Cosmonautica - A Space Trading Adventure
description:
Cosmonautica - A Space Trading Adventure


Extract 7zip and play! Launch game with CosmonauticabinCosmoNautica.exe


WHAT IF ELITE AND THE SIMS HAD A CHILD?

COSMONAUTICA is a fresh, funky and funny blend of space trading and life simulation. As captain of a small washed-up cruiser you put together a well-balanced crew and guide them through hilarious adventures in space. Trade, fight, manage and care Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in your cosmic rise from rags to riches!
TRADE

Explore randomly generated solar systems and pursue intergalactic trading between planets Ã¢â‚¬â€œ each having its individual traits.
FIGHT

Engage enemy vessels in fierce space fights. Toggle nimble maneuvers while firing broadsides, or try your luck with diplomacy.
MANAGE & CARE

Being a good captain is a tough job! Optimize your crew's potential by balancing their duties or promoting them Ã¢â‚¬â€œ without neglecting their individual needs. Implementing various rooms help you create an effective yet cozy environment for them to take on whatever challenges you'll be facing in the vastness of space.

Join for a first-hand experience!
APPLY
ALPHA ACCESS
QUESTS OR CHALLENGES? IT'S UP TO YOU!

Do you want to dive into COSMONAUTICA's story and unravel its mysteries or do you prefer roam the galaxy in free flight? Wanna participate in public challenges or rather create your own challenges and share them with your friends? There's plenty of space to go wild, so stay tuned for even more features to come!
